name: greenside
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
next to a putting green (= a small area of short grass on a golf course where players can gently hit the golf ball into a hole): greenside bunker His next shot landed in the greenside bunker (= hollow area of ground filled with sand). He avoided the greenside water with his fourth shot.
More examplesFewer examplesHe successfully holed a 30-foot shot from a greenside bunker at the 17th hole. His shot faded to the right and plunged into a greenside pond.He sent his fourth shot from the greenside rough into the pond.
